rezepte.name: Spaghettiese
rezepte.preparation: Put 1 tbsp of the oil in a large saucepan over a medium-high heat, add the beef and fry until well browned. Add the onions and garlic and cook for 5 minutes. Stir in the passata, tomato purée, red wine, and oregano. Simmer for 30 minutes while you cook the spaghetti. Serve the sauce over the spaghetti with parmesan and basil.

rezepte.name: Sweet potato & peanut curry
ingredients: 3 tbsp Thai red curry paste (vegetarian/ vegan)
500g sweet potato (peeled and cut into chunks)
rezepte.preparation: Melt 1 tbsp coconut oil in a saucepan over medium heat. Add the chopped onion, garlic, and grated ginger, cooking for 5 minutes. Stir in the curry paste and peanut butter, then add the sweet potato chunks. Pour in the coconut milk and simmer for 15-20 minutes, or until the sweet potatoes are tender. Stir in the spinach and lime juice, then serve with rice and peanuts if desired.

rezepte.name: Microwave scrambled eggs
rezepte.preparation: Beat the eggs, milk, and a pinch of salt together in a microwave-safe jug. Microwave on High for 30 seconds, then stir. Return to the microwave for another 30 seconds, stir again, and cook for another 15 seconds. If you prefer firmer eggs, cook for an additional 15 seconds and stir again before serving. Serve with toast.

rezepte.name: Bean & halloumi stew
ingredients: sundried tomato pesto or vegan alternative
½ small bunch of coriander (finely chopped)
rezepte.preparation: Heat 2 tbsp of olive oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Add the onion and red pepper, cooking for 5 minutes until softened. Add the garlic, red chilli pesto, sundried tomato pesto, and ground coriander, cooking for another 2 minutes. Stir in the beans and chopped tomatoes, and simmer for 10 minutes. Add the sliced halloumi and cook for 5 more minutes. Serve with garlic bread and sprinkle with fresh coriander.
